messages.message:
@Jessica or @Heymian - When setting custom permissions for users or groups, can you only create one set of custom permissions per subspace?

If I wanted one group to have one set of custom permissions and another group with a different set of custom permissions is this possible?
yup it should be possible, you just assign different acl’s for each group
Hmmm OK - NatWest are saying that when they try it changes the ACLs for all groups in that subspace. Will get them to raise a support ticket for this
